rules_text: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner’s control. When it does, if it’s the only creature on the battlefield, you gain 3 life and draw three cards.
notes:
https://www.deviantart.com/phill-art/art/Starcraft-Ghost-145332692



Alt_1:

Target creature phases out. When it phases back in, if it’s the only creature on the battlefield, you gain 3 life and draw three cards.
